title: Chemical characterization, neuroprotective effect, and in-silico evaluation of the petroleum ether extract of three palm tree species against glutamate-induced excitotoxicity in rats
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Fatma A. Moharram, Fadila M. Hamed, Elsayed K. El-Sayed, Shimaa K. Mohamed, Asmaa A. Ahmed, Sabah H. Elgayed, Mohammed Abdelrazek, Kuei-Hung Lai, Yara E. Mansour, Mohamed S. Mady, Heba E. Elsayed
